means: 硬（脑）膜上的，硬脑膜外的

sentence.Network_en: Some mothers choose to have an epidural when giving birth.
sentence.Network_cn: 有的母亲分娩时选择硬膜外麻醉。

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explore clinical effect of epidural anesthesia during labor.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨持续性硬膜外阻滞应用于分娩的镇痛效果及对母儿的影响.

sentence.Network_en: Summary of Background Data . Asymptomatic epidural hematoma is common after lumbar surgery.
sentence.Network_cn: 腰椎术后不典型硬膜外血肿很常见.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 硬膜外（epidural）麻醉与脊髓数小时相似。麻醉医师会把一条幼小的胶管插入病人背部的神经，并透过这胶管重复注入麻醉药或止痛 …
或是想用无痛分娩(epidural)？若还未决定可以先做个记号！
脊柱融合导致硬脊膜外麻醉 (epidural) 增加难度。如果硬脊膜外麻醉不可行时需医生讨论在分娩过程中疼痛控制的其他方法。
epididymus 附睾epidural 硬膜上的epiglottis 会厌

list.abs: Re:英语实用分类词汇 ... enlarged tongue 巨舌 epidural analgesia 硬膜外镇痛 epidural anesthesia 硬膜外麻醉.
epidiascope 反射幻灯机epidural canula 硬膜外套管epidural needle 硬膜外针
epidural canula 硬膜外套管epidural needle 硬膜外针epidurography 硬膜外腔造影术
3．硬膜外血肿（epidural hematoma）多由脑膜血管损伤所致，脑膜中动脉常见，血液聚集硬膜外间隙。硬膜与颅骨内板粘连紧密，故血肿较局限，呈梭.

entry.tran: （有时可用于分娩时的）硬膜外麻醉剂
entry.def: An epidural is a type of anaesthetic which is injected into a person's spine so that they cannot feel anything from the waist downwards. Epidurals are sometimes given to women when they are giving birth.

means.word_mean: 1. regional anesthesia resulting from injection of an anesthetic into the epidural space of the spinal cord; sensation is lost in the abdominal and genital and pelvic areas; used in childbirth and gynecological surgery
1. on or outside the dura mater
